titleStmt.title: The valiant Scot. By I.W. Gent
titleStmt.author: I. W., gent.
Henry, the Minstrel, fl. 1470-1492. Wallace.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper for Iohn Waterson, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Crown,

notesStmt.note: A tragedy based upon: Henry the Minstrel. Actis and deidis of Schir William Wallace.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Crown
